subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Wilson Chandler scored 23 points, David Lee added 22 points and 16 rebounds and the Knicks led by as many as 48 points in their rout of the Pacers.
snippet: Wilson Chandler scored 23 points, David Lee added 22 points and 16 rebounds and the Knicks led by as many as 48 points in their rout of the Pacers.
